entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 09:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
